channel.title: Need Help With HP ( NVM ALREADY FIXED IT )
channel.description: Uh, I Need Help With The HP. I Have Decided To Make Max Stat 200. I Did It And Got No Errors. But Theres One Flaw.. [IMG]http://img353.imageshack.us/img353/672/helpplzuz1.png[/img] When Ever I Gain An HP Level And Log Off, It Doesn't Save. Can Anyone Tell Me How To Make It So When You Log In, You HP Will Be 200/200

item.title: Need Help With HP ( NVM ALREADY FIXED IT )
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:

alright, that’s all fine and dandy…but that still doesnt fix myproblem

item.title: Need Help With HP ( NVM ALREADY FIXED IT )
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Oo I FIXED IT…
( IF U HAVE SAME PROBLEM )
Open Client.Java
Find loadsave();
Look Under A Few Lines And You Should See Something Similar To Thisif(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 200) { playerXP[3] = 986000000;
Than You Know What To Do

Read full topic

I Changed The Thing Like This for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 200; playerXP[i] = 99999999;
In Player.Java And Changed The Level…
